title: Implement todo routes
description:
Create REST API routes for todo CRUD operations.

Endpoints to implement:
- GET /todos - List all todos
- GET /todos/:id - Get single todo by ID
- POST /todos - Create new todo
- PUT /todos/:id - Update existing todo
- DELETE /todos/:id - Delete todo

Todo structure:
{
  "id": "unique-id",
  "title": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "completed": boolean,
  "createdAt": "ISO date",
  "updatedAt": "ISO date"
}

Acceptance Criteria:
- All endpoints return appropriate HTTP status codes
- GET endpoints return JSON data
- POST/PUT endpoints accept and validate JSON body
- DELETE returns 204 No Content on success
- 404 returned when todo not found
